tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was my first time visiting a dentist, and I was skeptical about where to go. 
I'm glad I chose Dr. Srushti. She was excellent at her job, well-spoken, and friendly. I'm happy to have found a good dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is polite, and explains and the issue and treatment very wisely. She is very gentle and efficient with her work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited Dr Srushti Garg on 24th Feb. First of all I was astonished to see the cleanliness and hygiene followed in the clinic. Since I had booked a prior appointment, and I reached on time, I dint have to wait outside. Dr Srushti had patiently heard my problems and guided me through the treatment process. She made me feel comfortable throughout the treatment amd kept me updated. I was overwhelmed and would recommend Dr Srushti to everyone who would want genuine advise and dental treatment. Thanks
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback! We really appreciate your punctuality, especially during covid times when we are also trying to maintain social distancing in the waiting area!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Although, it was a first oppointment with Dr. Shrushti but can happily call out that it very pleasant experience for me. Very kind and polite gesture by Dr. Shrushti. She has excellent knowledge and expertise. Had explained everything about the issue and treatment in detailed before commencing the procedure. The lab has well upto date equipments. While operating, Dr. Shrushti was immensely  focused and ensured not to caused much pain during Root Canal process by maintaining sheer control and calmness. Must recommend to every one for any Dental types problems.
reply_text: We really appreciate your feedback. Co-operative patients like you are always a treat for us to treat. We hope to see you soon againðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
i have been attended by both doctor Deep Garg and Dr.Shrusti 
it was a very good experience 
initial treatment was done by dr.shrusti followed by dental implant done by Dr.Deep
the processes as well as the treatment was explained very clearly along with the pros & cons
i had reservation about the implant but its been few weeks now and i am comfortable with it .
reply_text: thank you so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Fillings,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
Thank you Dr. Srushti Garg for getting my treatment done for Root Canal, Ceramic crowns, Dental filling, teeth polishing without much pain.

Thank you for the friendliness while treating and also for helping me understand the health issue.

Thanks again for the hard work you have done with lots of patience.
reply_text: it was a pleasure treating you. thank you so much for such kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted Dr Srushti Garg about my dental filling treatment. With her good medical knowledge and professional experience she explained me causes, precautions and treatment about my dental cavity. Clinic was well maintained. I would like to suggest doctors to think about reducing fees, it can help them grow exponentially. Overall good experience. My rating 3.5/5 :)
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your valuable feedback..
Our charges are set as per the standard DCI/IDA & Borivali/Kandivali/Malad Dentist Associations protocol ,But shall definitely look into it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As this was first experience with any dentist I was little worried before going but Doctor Srushti handled the whole situation very well and made me more comfortable with whole procedure.
I went there as my teeth had decay and some part of it was chipped.
Doctor Srushti handeled the whole procedure very professionally and recovered my teeth to it's earlier condition cosmetically.
Honestly I would recommend Garg Clinic for dental procedures. Thank you for overall very very positive experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure treating you. Keep smiling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Garg Clinic for my daughter's RCT. My daughter Abhigya was having severe tooth pain. It took 3 sittings but Dr Srushti Garg was very patient. She explained everything and treatment went nice and smooth. Thank you Dr Srushti for returning smile on my daughter Abhigya's face.
reply_text: Thank you so Much for confiding in us with your daughter's treatment. It was a pleasure treating her. Thank you for your valuable feedback.
